features: 100% recycled polyester fabric has hollow-core yarns and a diamond-grid back for moisture-wicking warmth that dries quickly; HeiQ® Fresh durable odor control
Pull-on styling for comfort and everyday wear
Elasticized fabric waistband is soft against skin
Gusseted crotch for comfortable fit while increasing range of motion
Forward-set, flatlock seams for a great fit and to minimize chafing; low-bulk construction for easy layering under midlayers and outerwear
